The company announced a bold new direction yesterday by partnering with Microsoft on its mobile strategy to compete with Apple and Google. The problem is it will take years for investors to see results. This partnership won't bear fruit until 2013 and beyond, said Alkesh Shah, an analyst with Evercore Partners.
